name: Amazon Rainforest
hint: The world's largest tropical rainforest, covering much of the Amazon Basin in South America

name: Atacama Desert
hint: The driest non-polar desert in the world, a plateau in northern Chile west of the Andes

name: Patagonia
hint: A sparsely populated region at the southern end of South America, shared by Argentina and Chile

name: Pampas
hint: Vast fertile grasslands in Argentina, Uruguay, and southern Brazil, the heartland of gaucho culture

name: Pantanal
hint: The world's largest tropical wetland area, mostly in Brazil's Mato Grosso do Sul, rich in wildlife

name: Altiplano
hint: A high plateau in the Andes of South America, the most extensive high plateau outside Tibet

name: Gran Chaco
hint: A hot and semi-arid lowland region shared by Argentina, Paraguay, Bolivia, and Brazil

name: Llanos
hint: Vast tropical grasslands in Venezuela and Colombia, drained by the Orinoco River system
